mapper.sql: TITLE, BIANMA, SPTYPE_ID, SPBRAND_ID, SPUNIT_ID, DESCRIPTION, SHORTDESC, USERNAME, GOODS_ID, ZCOUNT
mapper.update:
update
set TITLE = #{TITLE}, BIANMA = #{BIANMA}, SPTYPE_ID = #{SPTYPE_ID}, SPBRAND_ID = #{SPBRAND_ID}, SPUNIT_ID = #{SPUNIT_ID}, DESCRIPTION = #{DESCRIPTION}, SHORTDESC = #{SHORTDESC}, GOODS_ID = GOODS_ID where GOODS_ID = #{GOODS_ID}
mapper.select: select a.TITLE, a.BIANMA, a.SPTYPE_ID, a.SPBRAND_ID, a.SPUNIT_ID, a.DESCRIPTION, a.SHORTDESC, a.USERNAME, a.GOODS_ID, a.ZCOUNT, b.NAME BNAME, C.NAME TNAME, d.NAME UNAME from a left join cp_spbrand b on a.SPBRAND_ID = b.SPBRAND_ID left join cp_sptype c on a.SPTYPE_ID = c.SPTYPE_ID left join cp_spunit d on a.SPUNIT_ID = d.SPUNIT_ID where a.GOODS_ID = #{GOODS_ID}

select a.TITLE, a.BIANMA, a.SPTYPE_ID, a.SPBRAND_ID, a.SPUNIT_ID, a.USERNAME, a.GOODS_ID, a.ZCOUNT, b.NAME from a left join cp_spunit b on a.SPUNIT_ID = b.SPUNIT_ID where a.USERNAME = #{USERNAME} order by a.ZCOUNT

select a.TITLE, a.BIANMA, a.SPTYPE_ID, a.SPBRAND_ID, a.SPUNIT_ID, a.USERNAME, a.GOODS_ID, a.ZCOUNT, b.NAME from a left join cp_spunit b on a.SPUNIT_ID = b.SPUNIT_ID where a.USERNAME = #{USERNAME} and a.BIANMA = #{BIANMA} order by a.ZCOUNT
